title: YungSweetRo breaks silence on Travis Scott rumours and begs for Kylie Jenner to be left alone
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

YungSweetRo has spoken out for the first time on the Travis Scott rumours.

The Instagram model has hit headlines because rumours are circulating Travis cheated on Kylie Jenner , 22, with her.

In an impassioned post, the social media guru begged her 105K fans to leave the Keeping Up With The Kardashian star Kylie alone.

The dark-haired beauty claimed the scandal was wreaking havoc with "real lives" as she pleaded with fans to be kind in the wake of the cheating rumours.

She wrote: "None of these rumors are true. It's just the internet creating a false narrative.

(Image: YungSweetRo/Instagram)

(Image: YungSweetRo/Instagram)

"Please stop spreading lies and leave him, her & I alone because it's affecting our real lives. Thank you."

She added a heart emoji to the Instagram story.

The Mirror have approached representatives for Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott. The Mirror have also approached YungSweetRo on Instagram.

The last picture on her Instagram grid was uploaded five days ago.

(Image: Getty Images for The Met Museum/)

(Image: Getty Images for Netflix)

She wrote: "Let's hit the attic and hide out for about two weeks?"

In the snap, she tied her long mane into a top knot bun and only let her boxy fringe frame her eyes.

Travis and YungSweetRo have history together as they have been friends for years; they have posed for photographs together as far back as November 2013.

The rapper had been romancing Kylie for two wonderful years.

They become parents to their young daughter Stormi after Kylie fell pregnant just three weeks into their relationship.
description: The social media guru begged her 105K fans to leave Keeping Up With The Kardashians star Kylie alone
authors: Getty Images For The Met Museum
